str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Stronger, more excellent. Comparative of a derivative of kratos; stronger, i.e. better, i.e. Nobler.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Optative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.
I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To do that which is good. From agathopoios; to be a well-doer.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To do harm, do wrong, do evil, commit sin. From kakopoios; to be a bad-doer, i.e. to injure, or to sin.
